website_summaries.verdict: Luxury packaging and diffuser reference guide make for an excellent gift.
pros: Available in a range of different scents
Set comes in luxury, high-quality packaging, ideal for gift giving
Includes a diffuser reference guide filled with helpful tips and tricks
cons: Scent does not disperse well, better in small spaces

customer_reviews.title: What the hell did I just buy?!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, This thing is very expensive for no reason. Second, there’s no smell. I can’t smell anything! What a waste of my hard earned money
customer_reviews.author: RereB

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Omg! So impressed and in love with the smell. Strong and long lasting. Everytime I pass by the bathroom I smell it. I actually smell it throughout my home but more as I get closer to the bathroom. Highly recommend. I ordered the lavender scent. Just opening the box you smell it. Nice packaging so for a gift it’s something really nice to give.
customer_reviews.author: Jorman Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts when they first got here. First, as mentioned elsewhere, this is not lavender like we are used to, it's different. But it has really grown on me, I love it. The scent has lasted for a long time so far and I am only about halfway through the bottle. I will be reordering when this one runs out. We have it in the room where the cat litter boxes are, placed near the door, so our passing by moves the lavender scent around. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Can cover up...
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the packaging being really nice, the fragrance of this really lasts long and can cover up to our kitchen. It's absolutely worth it. I now have the confidence to invite guests in our house cause I know they will be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sha Sha

customer_reviews.title: ... is very potent and fills the house with a wonderful fragrance. It is expensive but you sent me ...
customer_reviews.text: Your product is very potent and fills the house with a wonderful fragrance . It is expensive but you sent me a coupon to reorder , which I will soon ! Thank you ! I LOVE THIS PRODUCT Because it is authentic French lavender , unlike many of the watered down products here. I lived in France for a long time and really appreciate la lavande de Provence ! I will always reorder it !
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D.

customer_reviews.title: An elegant and sophisticated fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I first came across Oojra a couple of years ago and quickly became addicted. The fragrance is so elegant and reminds me of an exclusive spa in Beverly Hills. I love love love the French Provence Lavender as well as the Thai Jasmine Bamboo. I always get so many compliments when guests come over and have always had incredible experiences with the customer service. I am a customer for life and can't wait to try the holiday diffusers. Exquisite!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: ​ ​- It smells really expensive in my whole house, it's a bit powerful but it makes sense as it covers my whole living room, that's why I want 1 more to cover the rest of the house by the dining room. I live in a super old home and has that old home smell. I have tried Glade and Febreeze plug ins and non of them will do the work as I have to buy 4 of them and the smell can be overpowering and fragrance smells like they belong in the bathroom instead
customer_reviews.author: The Advantaged Yacht Charters

customer_reviews.title: First was awesome, second purchase doesn't make the grade.
customer_reviews.text: The first lavender I loved. I would take a deep breath every time I stepped into the bedroom. When I reordered, this one doesn't give near the freshness and intensity. I have to search for the fragrance. I'll give it another try because the first was fabulous. If it doesn't smell as wonderful as the first I probably won't buy again because of the expense. If it works, I don't mean be paying a higher price... but not if the fragrance is hard for my nose to find.
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma Girl

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING and definitely goes well as a part of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING and definitely goes well as a part of my room's decorative style. It's beautiful and functional. The scent is definitely noticeable in my 12x10 room. Update. I loved it so much I ordered another one. Unfortunately they sent me the wrong scent. Lavender. Disappointing because it was supposed to be a gift
customer_reviews.author: Esther Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: The fragrance itself was nice, just not enough to scent that size of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office, 10x10 room and the scent is unable to be detected by anyone coming in. At first I tried one or two of the reeds, then eventually added all of them and it made no difference. The fragrance itself was nice, just not enough to scent that size of a room.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is excellent and the bottle is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wow... I don't know what to say. I ordered this product in lavender after reading the reviews. The packaging is excellent and the bottle is beautiful. The smell however was too strong for me. CJ from Oojra reached out to me which I greatly appreciated as a customer. The customer service was exceptional and although the Jasmine was not the right scent for me, the White Tea and Ginger is perfect! I will definitely order this product again,Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best lavender scented oil
customer_reviews.text: This lavender scent is just right - not too powerful or weak and it is so calming. I have tried many lavender scented items, but this is the best I have come across and will be purchasing more. I feel like there is a fresh lavender plant in the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like lavender - trashed it as I opened it
customer_reviews.text: I am quite good for smells and perfumes and I am French so I have spent quite a bit of time close to lavender. This diffuser smells like a very artificial perfume. I opened it and could not stand the smell more than ten seconds and dumped it as I don't have time to send back. This was my worst experience buying on amazon
customer_reviews.author: eric from France

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent. It's a nice clean smell without being overwhelming. Only wish the reeds would diffuse the scent a little better without me having to flip the reeds as often.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for 2 weeks, I followed the instructions and don’t find it works. You have to be right on top of the reeds to smell it. And this is on both of them. I tried moving item to a more confined area but it made no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Weak Scent?
customer_reviews.text: I've got all 10 reeds in the bottle in the small-medium size bedroom by the door to get the scent moving around. Doesn't really help.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bender

customer_reviews.title: This beautiful package was beyond my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: It seems as if this product, new to me, will be a big winner. Beautifully packaged with a true lavender scent, arrived in a timely fashion... the only thing to be determined will be longevity! Hopefully, it will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Lou M.

customer_reviews.title: Totally love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love the scent of this. It is not overwhelming, just nice! Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous05

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just have to be so appreciative for the company following up. It show that they care about the consumer experience with your products. It is though to buy a new fragrance, specially when you don't know the company, etc. I have to say I love the Eucalyptus diffuser, the aroma make me feel like Im surrounded by eucalyptus trees. Amazing product, amazing customer experience!
customer_reviews.author: luis ramirez

customer_reviews.title: The scent is lovely but...
customer_reviews.text: The scent IS lovely BUT you have to actually stick your nose into the bottle to smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Shindler

customer_reviews.title: Get the French lavender and lemon instead
customer_reviews.text: It's a great package. The selling point for me was "Australian." I'm willing to try most things Australian...but the scent isn't great for me. I'm going to continue using it until it's gone but I also purchased the French lavender and lemon. That's a great scent. Get that one instead. The packaging is great for both.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Lavender de Provence! Oui!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from France, I’m very fussy about lavender... I was a bit concerned the first day, of it being too overwhelming of a fragrance. But it toned down just right and I’ll be ready to flip the reeds when needed. Merci, for the lavender!
customer_reviews.author: Linjoy

customer_reviews.title: I have tried other bamboo reed scent diffusers and many smelled so strong and like cheap men's cologne
customer_reviews.text: The scent was not overwhelming but gentle and it did not give me a headache. I have tried other bamboo reed scent diffusers and many smelled so strong and like cheap men's cologne. They were not pleasantly fragrant. I love this product and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for amazing ambience .
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for more than a week now. It's a great product to improve the ambience of your house. Every time I enter my house, the lavender smells makes me happy and lifts my mood. The product is very durable and lasts really long. I would highly recommend the product to fellow amazon users.
customer_reviews.author: Akhil K.

customer_reviews.title: I received exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I received my money's worth on this product. The fragrance completely filled a 20x20 room nicely and I liked the special touch of receiving an instructional email from the company that gave me pointers on how to increase or decrease the scent. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: T Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty, but does nothing
customer_reviews.text: I can't smell this AT ALL. It is so subtle. I could barely smell anything even with my nose right in the bottle. Looks pretty, but does nothing. WAAAAAYYY to expensive for this useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Agostoni

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: Came with simple instructions and nicely packaged in the box. The scent is very strong so I only used a few sticks. It's sitting in my office and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: CNPinero

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged but bad scent
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed as the smell is very synthetic and it does not smell anything like lavender.
customer_reviews.author: James Guangxi Pak

customer_reviews.title: Great Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about ordering the diffuser without smelling it first but was pleasantly surprised. It has made my house smell great and I've received several compliments from guests. Great product, will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Winterowd

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like lavender
customer_reviews.text: This smells nothing like lavender and is not nice....not to mention you need a handyman to take off the plastic plug!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicest reed diffusers I’ve ever owned. Long lasting with a heavenly smell.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Vanadestine

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly describes this product
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying the lavender concentrated drops and adding water. Not even close to this product, plus the combination produced something like white mold on the base of the rods. This smells so much better, lasts a long time, and produces no negative side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Alice T.

customer_reviews.title: Laos White Tea and Ginger
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this scent appealing at all. It reminded me of cheap perfume. The fact that the scent was on the light side and needed to be stronger was probably a good thing in this instance.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the enclosed letter explaining how to use the item. Purchased as a gift so this was appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: s machnikowski

customer_reviews.title: It does its work of perfuming the room
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. I have received a lot of compliments from my family
customer_reviews.author: ines f rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I love the lavender scent fills my entire living area (I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the lavender scent fills my entire living area (I have a great room concept (about 500 Sq feet), and one Oojra diffuser scent fills, but doesn’t overwhelm, the entire great room! I also have 3 dogs and a cat, so I have a 2nd diffuser in the cat’s room. I would highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Conway

customer_reviews.title: Light fragrance is pleaqsant
customer_reviews.text: Bottle is very difficult to open. Could not have done it without the step by step guidance.
customer_reviews.author: Philip E Greenman

customer_reviews.title: Bad scent
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the smells, very unpleasant. Used it for a day and couldn’t stand it. Expensive waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the strong chemical smell. Burned my eyes.. Prefer Voluspa..
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Hardest thing to open ever
customer_reviews.text: Freaking hard to remove the stopper. Struggling and wanna return it already ughh
customer_reviews.author: Ian Chong

customer_reviews.title: Of the various diffusers I have tried, this is ...
customer_reviews.text: Of the various diffusers I have tried, this is of the most elegant design and actually works. Using only three reeds, in my bathroom this diffuser is consistently fragrant but not overpowering. I look forward to purchasing other fragrances in this series.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The smell is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I will be ordering more. The smell is fantastic!!! The look is beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Pretty packaging. The eucalyptus scent is faint. Customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It starts out nice but does not last. Its too expensive for how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not French Lavender Smell
customer_reviews.text: I wanted French Lavender essential oil, but when arrived, the smell is hardly anything like French Lavender. Very disappointed. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and is so wonderful I bought a second for the back end of the house!!!
customer_reviews.author: beccaj811

customer_reviews.title: Also comes in great gift packaging if needed
customer_reviews.text: Lovely! Will buy again!! Also comes in great gift packaging if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... elegant and my husband says that our apartment smells like "vacation". The bottle is beautiful and looks very ...
customer_reviews.text: The lavender scent is subtle and elegant and my husband says that our apartment smells like "vacation". The bottle is beautiful and looks very nice on our granite kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for for subpar smell coverage
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced diffuser that does little to freshen the air even in a tint room. I would never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ElenaV

customer_reviews.title: ... order the lavender scent but found it to be wonderful. The packaging and bottles were elegant - especially ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't order the lavender scent but found it to be wonderful. The packaging and bottles were elegant - especially for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product but a bit pricy
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product but a bit pricy. My wife loves it and wants a second one; this is the best diffuser so far we have used in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Wendyam Traore

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great product...lovely fragrance and beautiful bottle with great packaging for gift-giving.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Smells perfect! And it do lasts for three month when I put it in my bedroom with AC on 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it comes with no liquid at all, the bottle is empty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a go-to now for my room! I'll definitely be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I can barely smell it, even when i stand close to it. Not at all worth for that money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lavender scent un-noticeable. Expensive disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive product but slightly less than Nest which keeps going up in price so gave it a try. The plastic “plug” is nearly impossible to remove without superhuman effort. (worst I’ve ever experienced). When finally open, the Lavender scent is very pleasant but not strong enough for a diffuser. It is basically un-noticeable. Sigh. Product was an expensive disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful - lasts a long time - worth the $ - nice glass jar
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Disagree on the "fresh" smell
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the smell, it's not light and refreshing like others say. It reminds me of my grandmother's perfume, smells heavy like musk but a different odor. That being said, it came quickly and the packaging was very nice. The bottle is very good looking. I will also say the smell spread quickly into the room, good quality. If you like that heavy smell then I'm sure this will suit your tastes very well. If you were looking for something crisp smelling, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, Smells like bug spray!
customer_reviews.text: Oojra's Canadian Christmas Tree doesn't smell in the least like anything resembling christmas or a tree. It smells horrible, more like a bug spray. I had to pour it down the drain to get rid of the smell. However Oojra's Thai Jasmine Bamboo is amazing! Forget the Christmas tree diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soft fragrances
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second review because now I have to buy them for friends who want to know the product the moment they step into my house. Wonderful soft fragrances. All three are wonderful. You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: A Young

customer_reviews.title: Bad scent
customer_reviews.text: This scent diffuser smells nothing like what I received on a previous order, and its scent is not pleasant. I'd like my money back
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied NOT

customer_reviews.title: "Lavender" does not smell anything like it
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging and bottle and strong fragrance. Unfortunately the fragrance smells nothing like lavender. Will probably keep it, just because it's a pain to send back, but will order lavender oil from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: To high price it came broke a I found it at marshals for $19.99
customer_reviews.author: Mari Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Putrid
customer_reviews.text: This smelled absolutely awful. I'm not at all sensitive to strong smells, but this was so strong and smelled nothing like Lavender, but instead like a cloyingly sweet Vanilla. It smelled more like a low end home fragrance from a cheap store and was definitely not worth the price. I literally had to throw it out within minutes of setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: AKSR

customer_reviews.title: Costly but really good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like spending this much on immersion oil but you do get what you pay for. I have played with makiing my own and discovered a few things. The cheaper oils just don’t work as well. The immersion bottle neck needs to be narrow, The more sticks the more fragrant and they need to be thin. This product fits the bill and I could smell it in three big rooms only few hours after starting it. Only minor complaint is the white retainer cap is very difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: REELDOC

customer_reviews.title: A good product, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This really helps me when working. My work needs me to be focused on a project for 5-6 hours non stop. Though my room is already soundproof, I'm still having trouble focusing sometimes. I read online and found out that it has to do something with our senses such as smell. So I bought this hoping that it would help me relax and focus if needed. I didn't notice it at first until I finished a project. I felt like I was drifted away but still doing very well in my work without noticing. That's how I knew that it really worked. And after working hours, this relaxes me while I slowly fall into sleep. Wow. It's like magic.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly fragrance in beautiful bottle with black reeds
customer_reviews.text: The Oojra French Provence Lavender fragrance is a wonderful, complex balanced scent with lavender as its predominant note. I never get tired of it. It welcomes me into the bedroom and sets the mood for relaxation and rest. I believe I am sleeping more soundly and peacefully. I reduced the number of reeds to six which is ample for the size of the room. It is a full scent capable of filling the room, but it is not overpowering due to its balance. I will repurchase and cannot imagine being without it. The bottle is beautiful, and I love the black reeds. The presentation would make an excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerReader

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Reed Diffuser I have Bought so Far....
customer_reviews.text: I live in New England and my windows are closed tight for half of the year. No matter how much you clean, all houses have various odors, including cooking and pet smells, etc. I really appreciate and value walking into a room that has a pleasant fragrance. I have bought reed diffusers for years, and am always looking for long-lasting reed diffusers that continue to give off a pleasant fragrance. The Oojra French Provence Lavender is my favorite reed diffuser I have bought so far. I flip the reeds every day. Every one of my bedrooms has a lavender reed diffuser, and I find the fragrance relaxing and calming.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant, relaxing scent; comes with more than enough reeds
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very relaxing, not too artificial, and you can adjust the strength of the scent by changing the number of reeds. I keep one of these in my office, and when I first set it up I put five reeds in, and it was overpowering. Now I have two reeds in, and it's enough to keep my modestly sized office (50 sq ft) smelling pleasant. I've had it for several months and the scent doesn't seem to have dissipated, and there is barely a difference in the oil in the container.
customer_reviews.author: JayP

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because of some of the reviews saying how great it smelled
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I bought it because of some of the reviews saying how great it smelled. It barely filled the air with an aroma and it was a small room
customer_reviews.author: janice k. banther

customer_reviews.title: Smell still stays
customer_reviews.text: What great about this diffuser is that even after it burnt out, the smell still stays in the room for even a day. This is just so worth it and the smell is really good. It doesn't have that strong smell. Putting this in the living room makes such a difference especially when we are all resting and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Kendy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, worth my money
customer_reviews.text: The bottle itself is something to behold. I like the design very much. As for the smell, it covers a pretty wide area which I'm very happy about. Doesn't smell synthetic or fake. Very natural, fresh and just pure calming. My $$$ wasn't wasted. OOJRA, consider me a regular from here onward.
customer_reviews.author: Keziah

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful in our closet
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and has lasted for a long time (at least a month and still going strong)....what more can you ask for?! This product currently lives in our closet as it tends to get a little musty without any windows or ventilation. I'm pleasantly surprised with how great this product smells and performs.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Four stars only...
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best scents I've ever smelled. When I close my eyes, I feel like I'm actually surrounded by nature. Four stars only though because even their amazing scents couldn't cover up the overpowering smell from our leaky bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Oorja Lavender Essential Oil Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Lavender reed diffuser now for about 1 month. The fragrance is lovely and adds a nice touch to my lanai. It comes beautifully packaged. I appreciate the tip to use a cork screw to remove the plastic stopper. I might want to try other fragrances if available. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: andreaj

customer_reviews.title: Love it - the scent and bottle are exquisite
customer_reviews.text: Received this promptly. Beautifully packaged and wonderful scent. The scent isn't overpowering but makes the house smells marvelous. Which is saying a lot since we have two big junk yard hounds. I ordered the lavender but will try other scents as well next time. I will definitely repurchase - especially grateful for the discount that was included for my next order. These would make great gifts. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Bates

customer_reviews.title: So Relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Just one whiff from this is enough to relax me after a long day of hard work. I find it easier to sleep with a diffuser next to my bedside table. The calming scent of lavender is enough to lull me into a gentle sleep. This made a great addition to my home and I can't wait to try out more scents from Oojra.
customer_reviews.author: Gillus

customer_reviews.title: Great smell for home or office.
customer_reviews.text: Great scent! Light fresh scent that's not too overpowering for an enclosed space like my office. Reminds me of a light smell from a spa, just right. Has lasted a long time also. I just recently flipped over the reeds to refresh the oil on it. Other employees comment on the nice smell and want to know how they can buy it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: So soothing and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I like having these reed diffusers rather than having dangerous candles lying around. They give off the same amount of smell as any normal candles and they smell so soothing. These were perfect for brightening up the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J

customer_reviews.title: I love its lavender essential oil.
customer_reviews.text: I like the different variants of lavender in this diffuser. It has an added twist or blend which makes it more soothing. It has been spreading the scent inside my room for a couple of days already but it looks like the contents were not lessened at all.
customer_reviews.author: Env

customer_reviews.title: Defusers
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality defuser. I hope they get the other two scents in this size soon because the sample set I used had two other scents I enjoyed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: What a product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best diffuser I have had in my lobby. You immediately feel calm as you enter my apt.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling product. Did not lose it's fragrance over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle420

customer_reviews.title: Still Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a month since we put this into Service and it still smells fantastic, with less then 1/4 of the oil gone. I see this lasting at least two more months. I am already looking for a new sent for this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Carl V. Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Lavender Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have the diffuser on my nightstand,and the lavender scent is just heavenly! I will be refilling this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: E. Fleisher

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again...
customer_reviews.text: Got the French Lavender. Not very strong with 5 sticks used. Does last a long time, but way overpriced for what you get in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Burwells

customer_reviews.title: Just LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I just love the scent of this oil and cannot find anything that comes close to it.
customer_reviews.author: D.F.

customer_reviews.title: Strong aroma
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a sweet smell, it is strong and can be used in a large room.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Makulski

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. The scent is lovely and subtle. I intend to purchase another of the same scent very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: This product is very expensive, the bottle is small ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very expensive, the bottle is small. Need to have a larger scale bottle for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mainee

customer_reviews.title: Smells great. Turning the reeds over made the smell much ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Turning the reeds over made the smell much stronger. We put it in the room with our litter box and it made a world of difference. Looking forward to getting one upstairs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra deGruy

customer_reviews.title: I loved this Oojra scent
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Oojra scent! It is so pure and permeates through the whole apartment without being overwhelming. I've gotten many compliments on it. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Oojra French Provence Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Very strong non lavender smell, not at all relaxing or subtle. Too late to return, one decanter is now in the garage, the other will be given as a door prize to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Smart shopper 49

customer_reviews.title: Scent was nice and light while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. How is this pricey bottle already bone dry in 16 days?? Scent was nice and light while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jasmine Bamboo
customer_reviews.text: very good customer service. Credit to CJ. Ill definitely will buy again the jasmine Bamboo that CJ recommended me. Thanks a lot. RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: OOJRA Reed Diffuser Gift Set, Natural Essential Oil Long Lasting Fragrance 5 oz; Aromatherapy Air Freshener; French Provence Lavender (+Other Scent Options Available) w/Glass Bottle & Rattan Reeds
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL OIL AROMATHERAPY: Provence Lavender is a soft floral with minty herbal notes and a refreshing woody undertone to create a calm and balanced fragrance. Lavender is a calming, relaxing and comforting scent also known for being fresh and clean.

AUTHENTIC FRESH NATURAL CALMING SCENT: A scent that brings the outdoors indoors. It reminds you of fresh flowers, a luxurious spa, five star hotel or global travel experience with our alcohol free, paraben free, phthalates free and CARB compliant formula.

MODERN HOME DÉCOR ACCENTS: Curate a fabulous first impression for guests. Indulge with the modern decorative glass bottle, great for office, kitchen & dining room, bedding & bath storage, or as home fragrance accessories.

ADJUST THE INTENSITY OF THE REED DIFFUSER FRAGRANCE OILS:Our essential oil reed diffuser reference guide shows you how to create the desired intensity of scent to fill any indoor room without overwhelming your senses.

CHIC GIFT SET FOR HER OR HIM: Makes a glamorous gift for weddings registry, housewarmings, birthdays, holidays, or a great alternative to bringing wine for a dinner party. It is long-lasting and keeps giving for 3-4 months.
